alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Haralson; Paulding; Polk (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 28 at 4:15PM EDT until August 28 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Paulding County in northwestern Georgia... Eastern Haralson County in northwestern Georgia... North central Carroll County in northwestern Georgia... Southeastern Polk County in northwestern Georgia... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 415 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bremen, or near Buchanan, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dallas, Buchanan, Bremen, Temple, Rockmart, Aragon, Waco, Braswell, Yorkville, Fish Creek, Eubank Lake, Antioch, Van Wert, Abilene, and Draketown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
